title: AE60050: Plates And Shells - Quick Facts

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE60005 Bending theory of thin plates: governing equations, rectangular and circular plates, plates of other shapes; Large deflection bending analysis; Elastic buckling analysis of plates; Post buckling behavior; Bending theory of thin shells: shell geometry, governing equations. Membrane and bending analysis: shells of revolution and shells of translation; Energy and approximate methods for analysis of plates and shells.
